mainText:
To my friends at Apple,

I have recently joined the Apple family. I must say I have felt welcome from
the start. Through the vision of Mr. Jobs, technology has improved our
lives. I can honestly say, nothing has done more so recently for my family,
friends, and my education more than Apple products has.

All of us can appreciate what the company has done for the world. And all of
us can be grateful that Mr. Jobs shared his vision and talents with us while
he was able to do so.

May you rest in peace, Steve.

And thank you
- for everything.
author: Matt
